name: relaxer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] mainly US (also relaxant) something that helps you relax: It was a relaxer for him, like doodling.
[ C or U ] mainly US (also relaxant) a drug that helps you relax, or that makes part of your body less tense (= tight and stiff): Temazepam is a drug used as a muscle relaxer or sleeping aid. Relaxers should be used first, as the narcotics should only be used when other things don't give enough relief.
[ C or U ] (also relaxant) a special chemical for making curly hair straight or less curly: She packed what she deemed were essentials: cocoa butter, hair relaxer and body spray. Even if you don't want to spend megabucks on relaxers, book a consultation at your salon so you can learn the right way to do it yourself.
